Class javachart.chart.Background 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Background
public class Background
extends Object

Background(Globals)
Constructs a new Background with a default white fill color.

draw(Graphics)
Draw the chart background.
getGc()
Returns the Background's Gc class
getTitleColor()
Returns the current title color.
getTitleFont()
Returns the current title font.
getTitleString()
Returns the current title string.
getUseDisplayList()
Returns true if Background objects will appear in global DisplayList
resize(int, int)
Resizes the background.
setGc(Gc)
Use a new Gc for this Background
setTitleColor(Color)
Set the title color.
setTitleFont(Font)
Use a new title font.
setTitleString(String)
Use a new title string.
setUseDisplayList(boolean)
Determines whether Background objects should be added to global DisplayList.

Background 
  public Background(Globals g)
Constructs a new Background with a default white fill color. The initial title font is TimesRoman, point size 12, color black.
Parameters:
g - This chart's Global class

getGc 
  public Gc getGc()
Returns the Background's Gc class
Returns:
Current Gc class
setGc 
  public void setGc(Gc g)
Use a new Gc for this Background
Parameters:
g - New Gc
getTitleColor 
  public Color getTitleColor()
Returns the current title color.
Returns:
Current title color
setTitleColor 
  public void setTitleColor(Color c)
Set the title color.
Parameters:
c - A new title color
getTitleFont 
  public Font getTitleFont()
Returns the current title font.
Returns:
Current title font
setTitleFont 
  public void setTitleFont(Font f)
Use a new title font.
Parameters:
f - A new title font
getTitleString 
  public String getTitleString()
Returns the current title string.
Returns:
Current title string
setTitleString 
  public void setTitleString(String s)
Use a new title string.
Parameters:
s - A new title string
getUseDisplayList 
  public boolean getUseDisplayList()
Returns true if Background objects will appear in global DisplayList
Returns:
current status
setUseDisplayList 
  public void setUseDisplayList(boolean onOff)
Determines whether Background objects should be added to global DisplayList. Default is true.
Parameters:
New - option of display list usage
See Also:
DisplayList, Globals, Chart
draw 
  public synchronized void draw(Graphics g)
Draw the chart background. Also draws the title if set.
Parameters:
g - Graphic class to draw on
resize 
  protected synchronized void resize(int w,
                                     int h)
Resizes the background. Usually called automatically by the Chart class containing this Background.
Parameters:
w - New width
h - New height
See Also:
Chart
